name: Fairytale Kart Race
summary:
Fairytale Kart Race is a go kart racing game with battleheart heroes
5 different heroes race in an epic go kart racing tournament placed in mythical places.
Choose your favorite kart hero and out run your opponents using mad driving skills and magical power ups. You can play against AI players, in tournaments or in single races and you can play time trials to try make the best score.
You can control your buggy kart with the accelerometer, a virtual gamepad or a real game pad.
